title: We also offer Cash on Delivery.
subtitle: Did you know?
description: You simply notify the customer of their invoice total including our delivery fee and we will collect the cash on your behalf. The cash collected is also deposited into your bank account. For this service, we charge a weekly fee of $20. Our base rate is $40 for Nationwide delivery and we also deliver to Tobago. Safe and Reliable Courier Services that are focused on U. Inbox or WhatsApp Us at 770-4246 to book your delivery now.
